name: The Trinity
description: The Trinity; Unknown; Ulm, Germany; shortly after 1464; Watercolor and ink on paper bound between original wood boards covered with original pigskin; Leaf: 30.6 × 22.1 cm (12 1/16 × 8 11/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XII 8, fol. 52; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Trinity
medium: Watercolor and ink on paper bound between original wood boards covered with original pigskin
